name: You can now apply for a FO as a sole applicant (joint)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

You can now apply for a final order as a sole applicant. 

The court served (sent) your ((partner)) notice of your intention to apply. The court has not received any response from them so you can now apply to ((isDivorce??finalise your divorce))((isDissolution??end your civil partnership)).

Apply for a final order: ((signin url))  

Divorce and Dissolution 
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm)
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk 

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: Important: your ((isDivorce??divorce application)) ((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership))
